ygData.subject: RE: Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone know the purpose of the Gem cutter? ... From: crys@mdc.net [mailto:crys@mdc.net] Sent: Sunday, November 28, 1999 6:37 AM To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone know the purpose of the Gem cutter?

-----Original Message-----
From: crys@... [mailto:crys@...]
Sent: Sunday, November 28, 1999 6:37 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial


From: crys@...

Animated Bait = Cork, Spiket; Cost 4cp, Trivial at Level 50

Aqualung = fine coral mesh, silk lined steel helm,metal twine, gnomish
bolts, metal rod, fresh fish; Cost 250pp, Trivial at ??

Collapsible Fishing Pole = 3 metal rods, gnomish bolts; Cost 7pp, Trivial at
50

Compass = pie tin, skewers, water flask, static orb, cork; Cost 3pp, Triv at
50

Firewater = water flask, gnomish spirits; Cost 8sp, Triv at 50

Flameless Lantern = large lantern, twine, firewater; Cost 2pp, Triv at 68

Gemcutter = metal rod, diamond dust, cam, metal fastening, firewater,
grease; Cost ??, Triv at ??

Gnomish Fireworks = metal shaft, bat wing, firewater; Cost 2gp, Triv at 50

Mechanized Lockpicks = gear, sprocket, lockpick, rat ears; Cost 18pp, Triv
at ??

Rebreather = aqualung, lime coated meshing, shark skin tubing, platemail
helm, firewater, metal fastening; Cost ??, Triv at ??

Spyglass = collapsible fishing pole, bottle, twine, metal rod, reflective
shard; Cost 25pp, Triv at 95

Stalking Probe = 2 gears, bottle, metal rod, firewater; Cost 18pp, Triv at
102

Standard Bow Cam = gear, grease, gnomish bolts; Cost 15pp, Triv at 75


This is all from that tinkering page .. hope it helps...


Tinkerbear
29th season magician in training
Erolissi Marr
